page.title: 18TOURISM
page.content: Charter cruises - Shardlow for private functions; 6 standard cruisers to choose from. Prices range from Â£51 for 1 hour to Â£104 for 5 hours. A selection of cold meals are available prices from Â£1.45 - Â£2.75 per person. The Old Iron Warehouse Charter Boat Hire holds 60 people and 5 crew from April to Christmas up to 10 hours duration, lunch dinner or tea can be provided. Shardlow Marina & Leisure Centre private moorings for canal and river crafts, with a shop for selling marine accessories. Shardlow Caravan Site touring vans Â£3.50 per night, shower block, with metered hot water.
